section.p: A container for the responses to a section of the assessment.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] sectionId with data type String
The unique identifier for the group of related responses.

Contains zero or more [0..*] response, where its type is Assessment Instrument Response
The response to an assessment question.

Contains zero or one [0..1] sectionScore with data type Real
The total of the numeric values associated with each response in the assessment.

Contains zero or one [0..1] sectionId with data type String
The unique identifier for the group of related responses.

Contains zero or one [0..1] sectionScore with data type Real
The total of the numeric values associated with each response in the assessment.

Contains zero or more [0..*] response, where its type is Assessment Instrument Response
The response to an assessment question.
